briefdescription.para: Converts a serializable object into a BSON document value TODO This is not very clean and kind of inefficient.

detaileddescription.para:
Maybe we should be passing references into the bson_ostream callback?
T
A type that is serializable to BSON using a BSONArchiver.
obj
A serializable object
A BSON document value representing the given object.

briefdescription.para: Converts a serializable object into a BSON document value in dotted notation for $set.

detaileddescription.para:
TODO This is not very clean and kind of inefficient. Maybe we should be passing references into the bson_ostream callback?
T
A type that is serializable to BSON using a BSONArchiver.
obj
A serializable object
A BSON document value in dotted notation representing the given object.

briefdescription.para: Converts a bsoncxx document view to an object of the templated type through deserialization.

parameterdescription.para: A default-constructible type that is serializable using a BSONArchiver
A BSON document view. If the BSON document does not match the schema of type T, BSONArchiver will throw a corresponding exception. TODO what does BSONArchiver throw?

simplesect.para: Returns by value an object that corresponds to the given document view.

briefdescription.para: Fills a serializable object 'obj' with data from a BSON document view.

parameterdescription.para: a type that is serializable using a BSONArchiver
A BSON document view. If the BSON document does not match the schema of type T, BSONArchiver will throw a corresponding exception. TODO what does BSONArchiver throw?
A reference to a serializable object that will be filled with data from the gievn document.
